findings: Healed surgical scar on the neck
Mobile, rubbery nodule, 4 cm in diameter, in the upper left thyroid bed
Positive Chvostek's sign on percussion of the homolateral masseter region
Left thyroid nodule measured 6 cm in diameter
Computed tomography revealed a heterogeneous mass, 48 mm in diameter, with central calcification at the level of the left thyroid bed

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increase in left thyroid nodule size from 4 cm to 6 cm

physical_examinations.date: When the patient was 36.5 years old

findings: Micronodular lesions on the gingiva and tongue
Small hypoechoic region of the left thyroid bed measuring 6 mm in maximal dimension, an increase from 3 mm 1.5 years earlier
relevant_findings.examination: The remainder of the examination was unchanged
